summaryPoints: Designed and implemented **React + Redux front-end applications** with responsive support for iOS and Android, improving UX and reducing page load time by **30%.**
Built **scalable backend APIs with Ruby on Rails**, integrating secure internal Medidata system and third-party vendor APIs.
Led **unit and E2E testing strategy** using Jest, Cypress, and Cucumber, ensuring **98%+ code coverage.**
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve high-priority issues, reducing bug backlog by 50%.
Skilled in **AI & ML technologies** including Python, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, BeautifulSoup, Jupyter Notebook, **LLMs, Prompt Engineering, and RAG**.
Architected and developed **enterprise-scale applications** using .NET, Python, React, and Azure, driving performance, scalability, and reliability.
Designed and delivered **mission-critical REST APIs** for healthcare systems, achieving **99.99% uptime** and seamless third-party integrations that reduced development time by **35%.**
Spearheaded the **migration of monolithic applications to cloud-based microservices (Azure, AWS)**, cutting infrastructure costs by **25%.**
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (PMs, QA, clients) to resolve technical issues and ensure timely project delivery.
Mentored and coached engineers, increasing **team velocity by 20%** and **onboarding speed by 30%**.
Led large-scale **software deployments**, ensuring efficient rollout of complex systems in production.
Developed scalable **ASP.NET, C#, JavaScript & SQL** applications for enterprise clients.
Designed and optimized database schemas, improving query performance by **40%.**
Designed enhancements and updates for subsystems of end-user applications software running on local, networked and Internet-based platforms.
Offered experience with **Asp.net, C#, SQL, JavaScript**.
